Minds recommends {{id="START_LINK" ctype="x-a" equiv-text=""}}MetaMask{{id="CLOSE_LINK" ctype="x-a" equiv-text=""}}. It's a bridge that allows you to visit the distributed web of tomorrow in your browser today. MetaMask includes a secure identity vault, providing a user interface to manage your identities on different sites and sign blockchain transactions.
There are no local wallets available, the wallet manager is locked, or you're connected to a different network.
